title: What you do not know about the interpretation of a dog bite in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a dog bite in a dream and its interpretation: Dreaming about a dog has only a special meaning. As for the dog bite, it is another sign that you should pay attention and know the meaning of this disturbing dream. We present to you the interpretation of a dog bite in a dream in detail by Imam Nabulsi and Imam Ibn Sirin. A dog bite in a dreamIn the interpretation of Imam Ibn Sirin, seeing a dog has many interpretations, the most important of which are the following: Seeing a dog in a dream indicates the presence of a cunning and treacherous enemy, and the dreamer must reconsider his dream. What is around it and get to know it. A person who sees a dog biting each other indicates that the person will be betrayed while walking an unhealthy path. What is the interpretation of a dog bite in a dream? Seeing a dog bite may indicate someone’s desire to steal the dreamer’s money. It was also interpreted that The dreamer has committed sins and immorality. A dog bite in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets a dreamer who sees a dog biting in a dream as evidence that there is someone close to him who is trying to cause him great harm and he must be careful to be safe from his harm. If one sees a dog being bitten in his dream This is a sign that he will be betrayed by those close to him and that he will enter a state of great sadness because of his misplaced trust. In the event that the dreamer notices a dog bite during his sleep, this expresses the unpleasant events that will occur around him, which will put him in a state of extreme discomfort. Seeing the dreamer being bitten by a dog in a dream symbolizes the unpleasant news that he will receive, which will make him enter a state of severe depression. If one sees a dog being bitten in his dream, this is a sign of the presence of many difficulties and problems that he is suffering from at that time and his inability to To solve it makes him feel uncomfortable. A dog bites in a dream for a single girl. Seeing one dog in a dream indicates the presence of a person characterized by malice and malice, and one must pay attention to him. A single girl sees a black dog in a dream, some of which indicate the presence of a very hypocritical, treacherous and hateful person to her, But it shows her love and loyalty. I dreamed that a dog bit me on my leg for an unmarried woman. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream being bitten by a dog on her leg indicates the presence of a malicious young man who is trying to get very close to her at that time and deceive her with sweet words and she must not fall into his trap. If the dreamer sees during His dream is that the dog is biting his leg, this indicates the presence of a very close friend who does not love her at all and wants to cause great harm to her. If the dreamer sees a dog biting his leg in his dream, this means that she will be betrayed by the people closest to her and as a result she will enter a state of severe depression For the dreamer to see in a dream a dog biting her leg symbolizes many changes that will occur in her life that will not be satisfactory to her at all. If a girl sees in her dream a dog biting her leg, this is a sign that someone will marry her, but it will not suit her and she will reject him as a result. Immediately.Interpretation of a dream about a dog bite. Seeing an unmarried woman with a dog in a dream indicates the presence of a girl or a mirror characterized by shrewdness with a feeling of envy and hatred. Seeing a white dog in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates

title: Interpretation of a dream about reading or listening to Surat Al-Zalzalah in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat Al-Zalzalah in a dream, and reading Surat Al-Zalzalah means victory over enemies and overcoming difficult stages, as the abundance of goodness appears in the viewer, and it could be a message to him, i.e. the dreamer, that they repent and return to God. Their dreams and they want to know the meaning of this surah means that reading Surat Al-Zalzalah in a dream It indicates positive changes and developments in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of a dream about reading or listening to Surat Al-Zalzalah in a dream. If a person sees Surat Al-Zalzalah in his dream and that person is carrying many worries and burdens on his shoulders, then this Surah indicates that he will get rid of all those worries. But if Someone dreams that he is reading Surat Al-Zalzalah in his sleep. This is good news for the one who saw the dream that God will heal him and keep him away from everything that bothers him and any health problems that he faces at all. times. General. If a young man sees Surat Al-Zalzalah at the beginning of his life in a dream, this is a sign that God will honor him with deeds from which he will achieve many successes and profits and excel in his work. Interpretation of the dream of seeing reading or hearing Surat Al-Zalzalah in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says: Seeing Surat Al-Zalzalah in a dream is evidence On the arrival of the people of disbelief. It is believed that Surat Al-Zalzalah shows the abundance of sustenance and that the person with the opinion gets a lot of money. Interpretation of a dream when reading or hearing Surat Al-Zalzalah by Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi believes that Surat Al-Zalzalah indicates that Satan is far away from the one who saw the dream, for he is one of them. The fence that keeps Satan away Al-Nabulsi also says that seeing Surat Al-Zalzalah is evidence of God’s earthquake for the non-Muslims. Interpretation of a dream about seeing someone reading or listening to Surat Al-Zalzalah in a dream for a single woman. If the girl who saw Surat Al-Zalzalah in her dream wants to marry someone and her engagement is delayed, then Surat Al-Zalzalah is a sign for her and brings good news. With the imminent time of her marriage to the husband suitable for her. Interpretation of a dream about seeing oneself reading or listening to Surat Al-Zalzalah in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is reading or listening to Surat Al-Quzal, this means that her family situation will improve, especially if she is suffering from pressure with her husband. Or she has a special temperament, all of that. This will improve and fix the situation. Interpretation of a dream about reading or listening to Surat Al-Zalzalah for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees Surat Al-Zalzalah in her dream, this is evidence that the birth will be easy and healthy and God will grant her a healthy, healthy child. If this pregnant woman feels tension and pressure and sees Surat Al-Zalzalah reciting it. In her sleep, she will get rid of all this stress, her condition will stabilize, and the birth will be easy. Commentators say: If a pregnant woman sees Surat Al-Zalzalah in her dream, she will give birth of the same kind that she wants. Interpretation of a dream about reading or hearing Surat Al-Zalzalah for a divorced woman: If a divorced woman sees in her dream that she is reading Surat Al-Zalzalah, then this A sign to her that she will end the worry and sadness that she is currently experiencing. Likewise, commentators say that if a divorced woman sees Surat Al-Zalzalah in her dream, this is evidence that God will quickly grant her a good husband who will achieve what she wants and more. And if the divorced woman is exposed to injustice

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a deer in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing a deer in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Seeing a deer in a dream means success and many opportunities. Deer hunting shows a love of adventure and daring, and the person you love and follow has an idea of ​​interpretation of what you love. Running away from a deer also indicates remorse for doing something, and whoever saw a deer’s horn in his dream, his dreams were evidence of the strength of his character and his reaching the highest positions, and therefore we convey to you the most important interpretation of the dream of seeing a deer in a dream. The dream of seeing a deer by Ibn Sirin. Interpreted by Ibn Sirin Seeing a deer in a dream symbolizes good luck. The person who saw a deer escaping in his dream indicates that there is a missed opportunity by the dreamer. For those who saw the death of a deer in his dream, his dream indicates a false and ended friendship. The interpretation of the dream indicates a vision A dead deer in a dream also indicates failure. In general, killing a deer in a dream means treachery and betrayal among friends. A dream about seeing a deer in Nablus. Seeing a dreamer running away from a deer in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is losing many valuable opportunities in his life. Seeing him trying to hunt a deer in a dream is evidence that he has a bold personality and loves many adventures. In his life. As for seeing the dreamer eating deer meat in his dream, this indicates his desire to break traditions and change his life for the better. Seeing a dead deer in a dream is evidence that he has lost a lot of money, and the merchant who sees in his dream that he is carrying a deer is evidence of his profit from his trade. Dream To see a deer for a single woman: Interpretation of seeing deer blood for a girl and her dream shows her money. But if she sees that she is eating a deer, the dream indicates her livelihood. Seeing a deer in a girl’s dream indicates purity, honor, and good luck in matters of a happy marriage. A deer in a dream shows her lover and that she will marry her lover. Interpretation of a dream about a deer for a married woman. Seeing a deer in a dream for a married woman indicates On her good luck. Seeing a dead deer for a married woman in a dream indicates her loneliness, her preoccupation with her mind, and her search for stability. However, if a married woman sees a deer’s eye, her dream indicates sadness and indifference. Seeing a married woman eating deer meat in her dream means treachery and treachery. A dream about seeing a deer for a woman Pregnant: A pregnant woman seeing a deer in a dream means that she will become pregnant soon. If she sees a beautiful pregnant deer, her dream shows her beautiful qualities, morals, and justice. Seeing a deer in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates an easy birth. The interpretation of seeing a stray deer in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates problems in childbirth. A dream about seeing a deer for a man. The interpretation of seeing a beautiful deer in a man’s dream indicates improvement in things in his life. A man who sees deer antlers in a dream is evidence of his strength and high status among people. Seeing deer blood in a dream means that the dreamer has gone through many problems and troubles in his life. Interpretation Dreaming of seeing a dead deer in a dream is a sign that something has happened in his life. Also, seeing the eyes of a deer in a man’s dream indicates that he has gone through something sad in his life. A dream of seeing a deer for single people: Seeing deer antlers in a young man’s dream indicates

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a friend in a dream in full for a single or married woman and a pregnant woman?

preview.html: Why interpret a dream about a friend in a complete dream? It is said that seeing a friend in a dream full has many meanings, and seeing his colleagues in a dream full is always one of the dreams that may raise many questions from the dreamer and the interpretation of the dream he sees about a friend who is quarreling with him. It could be often. The presence of morals in our world is one of the wonderful situations that a person can receive in his life. If you are interested in knowing the correct and correct interpretation of seeing a friend in a dream in full, then you should read the article. Why dream of seeing a friend arguing with him? They say that seeing a friend in a dream in full arguing with him does not matter. If you argue with him, because this indicates the fears, problems, and exhaustion that the dreamer is going through in his life. And when you see a complete person in a dream, a friend who is arguing with him, this indicates kindness, relief from sadness, and comfort. God knows best. See also: Why do you dream of seeing Abu Bakr Al-Siddiq in a complete dream? Why do you dream of seeing school friends for poor women? They say that seeing your school friends in your dream is a sign of nostalgia for the past and longing for childhood moments. In addition, dreaming of old friends indicates cooperation or work with Each other, and perhaps a project that connects them to each other for the sake of profit, and God knows best. And to dream of a friend of a single woman named Faraj in the name of Nada, Fara, Sarah, Israa, Iman, and Noura, and the names that have something beautiful indicate kindness, joy, and pleasure that the dreamer can experience. My life. See also: Why dream of seeing a friend? Why dream of betrayal by a friend? Betrayal in a dream is not a case of betrayal in reality. Seeing the betrayal of a friend in a complete dream means that there are people in his life who are abusing him, and we warn him against that, and God knows best. Why does a friend dream? Seeing a friend in a complete dream means that the dreamer must be careful in his life, take care of it, and think about the affairs of his life in case he sees a close friend. Seeing bad friends in a complete dream is a warning to the dreamer to stay away from sins and get closer to God Almighty and God is Known. See also: Why do you dream of seeing a dolphin in a complete dream? Interpretation of seeing a quarrel with a friend. Seeing a friend in a dream whole and suffocated with him is a sign of separation between him and the one who saw him in the dream in full or With another person, but God knows best. See also: Why does a person argue with him in a dream in full? Seeing classmates in a dream full. Seeing classmates in a dream full is a longing for memories and optimism in life. Seeing classmates full in a dream also means goodness and existence, God is Most High and Most Knowing. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, leave it in a comment below and our team will respond to you.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a new mobile phone in a dream for a married woman, a single woman, a divorced woman, a pregnant woman, and a man

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a new mobile phone in a dream for married, single, divorced, pregnant women and men. Seeing a new mobile phone in a dream has many interpretations. Here we put the interpretation of a dream about a new mobile phone for married single women, divorcees, pregnant women and males, and this vision has a different meaning for each category. Interpretation of dreams: A new mobile phone for a married woman is considered seeing a phone. A new interpretation of dreams that have many interpretations and many different interpretations. It is necessary to know that every detail in the dream has many interpretations, and here we can put the most important interpretations related to the interpretation of the new dream. A married woman's mobile phone: Seeing a married woman's new mobile phone in a dream shows the marital happiness she experiences, the harmony that exists between them, friendliness and understanding. Also, seeing the husband in a dream calling her via the new cell phone means that he will be away from her for a while, but it will not be long. And when she gets The mobile phone as a gift from the man, this means that their wedding anniversary is approaching, and when she sees that her new phone is lost, this means that she will fall into many problems and difficulties when her husband is missing. See also: Interpretation of dreams for hair loss in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, and Fahd Al-Osaimi. Interpretation of dreams. A small phone for singles. The phone or mobile is a means. Communication is a task that anyone can use, because it is necessary and because it saves time and effort for people when they want to communicate with each other, and it is also necessary to know that seeing a dream about a new phone for single people has many connotations that we will put here: Seeing a phone for an unmarried girl indicates that she will meet a new person who will be her friend. CloseupAlso, when individuals get a new phone, it means that they will get a lot of good news in a few days. As for losing the new phone, it means a lot of physical problems that she will face. Seeing the dead man giving her a new cell phone means that she needs to pray. And when she sees She gets a new mobile phone and breaks its screen. This shows the bad luck of this girl. When you see that she is repairing the mobile phone, this means the success and intelligence that distinguishes this girl. Seeing her father giving her a new phone means that someone is proposing to her. The cell phone used in the dream for a divorced woman. A divorced woman may face many... There are problems and many things that may bother her in her life, but what we need to know is that there are many dreams that she may see that carry many meanings, and here we put the interpretation of the new mobile phone. In a dream about a divorced woman: Seeing a new phone for a divorced woman indicates that there is good and positive news for the woman. Seeing that he is buying a new phone is a sign that he will get a lot of money and livelihood. And when she sees in her dream that she got a new cell phone and it was from his ex-wife, this means that he is still He thinks about her and that they are still in a relationship. title: What is the interpretation of seeing chicks in a dream in full?

preview.html: The Trend website offers you an interpretation of a dream about chickens, and this is reflected in chickens, or what are called chickens in some places. Chicken is a small chicken. Some people in a complete dream can see chickens in a complete dream, so we have collected for you, dear God, all the correct and reasonable testimonies and interpretations. Related to this dream are the books of major scholars on the interpretation of dreams and visions. We also mentioned in detail the interpretation of a dream about a chicken for elderly, married and pregnant women, as well as for men. If you are interested in the interpretation, follow the rest of the article. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing chickens. Ibn Sirin says: Seeing a yellow chicken in a dream is full of visions indicating that he heard good news. Also, seeing chicks in a dream in their entirety indicates to the dreamer: That he will soon achieve his goals and desire what he is looking for. Seeing a whole black chicken in a dream means that you will earn prohibited money and you will get into trouble because of this money. See also: Why do you dream of seeing a whole chicken in a dream? Why do chicks dream of bad women? The only woman who sees a whole chicken in a dream It means a lot of goodness and happiness to her. The presence of an egg hatched by a chick in a girl’s dream indicates the approaching date of her marriage. Seeing a large number of chicks for a girl indicates the joys and pleasures that she will feel in the next life. A dead chicken in a woman’s dream with a pot suggests that she will soon achieve her goals and aspirations. But killing a girl in a dream full of chicks is an unpleasant vision, indicating problems and fears. See also: Why dream of seeing wings in a dream full? Seeing chicks in a dream full for a married womanSeeing a single chick in a dream of a married woman indicates family happiness and stability in her life. In addition to that A whole chick hatching from an egg in a dream indicates her imminent pregnancy. Seeing a large number of chicks for a married woman in a full dream means that she will give birth to many children, and God knows best. See also: Why do you dream of seeing the droppings of Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi in a full dream? Why does a pregnant chicken dream? Why A pregnant woman’s dream of chicken speaks of the health of her fetus. The appearance of a chicken from an egg in a dream completely symbolizes the ease of childbirth and her joy of health and well-being. A pregnant chicken in a dream is a sign of kindness, support and happiness. Why dream of seeing a chicken for a man? Seeing a whole small chicken in a dream for an unmarried young man indicates Support him in his imminent marriage. Chickens in men’s dreams symbolize the fulfillment of their desires and aspirations. Chicks in a dream speak of good morals and a good reputation among people. A chicken in a sick person’s dream speaks of a speedy recovery from illness and good health. Playing with chickens in a dream is complementary to a man, its meaning is that It will provide him with children and good clothes, and God knows best. See also: Why dream of seeing a victim in a dream in full? If you have a dream and want to interpret it, leave it in the comment below and a team of experts will answer you soon.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a gift of gold in a dream for unmarried and pregnant women in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about a gift of gold in a dream for single women, married women, and pregnant women in detail. Gold is one of the jewels that every girl or married girl desires, because she loves wearing gold in its various beautiful forms, as it is an ornament for all girls and gives the girl wonderful beauty that makes her bright and beautiful, so there is a lot of research on the Internet about it. Interpretation of seeing a dream about a gift of gold in a dream for single, married, and pregnant women, and it is explained by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi and others. Interpretation of dreams about a gift of gold for a single woman Seeing a gift of gold in a dream is one of the things that can carry a bad or good meaning for the dreamer. Seeing gold in a dream controls many things, especially the various aspects of the dream that the dreamer must mention, and the interpretation came as follows: Finding gold in a dream is an indication of the patient’s recovery in the event of the dreamer’s illness. In the interpretation of the dream, finding an alloy of gold and finding On it, it is a sign of achieving a lot of profits and huge profits that the dreamer will obtain, God willing. If a man finds gold in a dream, this indicates the child’s great provision and strength by the grace of God Almighty. It also symbolizes the marriage of an unmarried girl, and the marriage of an unmarried young man to a beautiful girl. And good, God willing. In another narration, finding a gold necklace indicates an official secret mission, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about fighting with one’s sister in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin, and its most important interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about losing gold for a married woman. Losing gold is one of the things that causes anxiety, terror, and tension in people. Women who waste their gold, which makes them constantly search for it, so seeing this dream in a dream can have many indications to learn about through this article as follows: The indication of pregnancy in the coming period and the provision of good offspring and that she will give birth to a male, and if she does not give birth before Therefore, the dream promises her the birth of a girl, and God knows best. As for the dreamer who has male children, seeing gold in a dream is a sign that one of her children will get married soon, and God Almighty. Seeing gold in a woman’s dream is evidence of her respect for her husband, her appreciation for him, and hearing good news, God Almighty. God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing a married woman wearing gold in her dream means that she will be blessed with fair children and will have a high status. For a woman to find gold in her dream is a sign of success and distinction in practical and professional life, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about finding a gold chain for a pregnant woman. There are many Single girls who always want to have gold chains, so finding a gold chain in a dream has many important connotations and interpretations that must be taken into account in order to know its interpretation as follows: It signifies pleasant events and good tidings that will come to him, God willing. The girl who sees gold In her dream, it was shown that she is one of the righteous people who do good deeds. It also indicates purity, chastity, virtue, and a good reputation. Interpreted by Ibn Sh.

title: Interpretation of seeing people and animals slaughtered in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing slaughter in a dream sometimes indicates injustice and oppression or following heresies and the vision can be interpreted as good and abundant food enjoyed by the dreamer and seeing the slaughter of a human being is different from slaughtering animals of any kind, so we will learn together about the interpretation of the vision according to Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of seeing a slaughterhouse in a dream and the scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision of a person being slaughtered in a dream unjustly and disobediently, so whoever dreams of slaughtering should seek refuge in God from the whispers of Satan. And if the dreamer is imprisoned and sees that someone is slaughtering him, he will be released, but if the dreamer feels fear and anxiety, his situation will change for the better and he will feel safe, and if he is a slave, he will be and if he is in power his influence increases and if the dreamer is disturbed he will be released and God knows best. Seeing the slaughter of a human being and cutting him up indicates that he is exposed to slander and gossip, and seeing the slaughter of relatives is evidence of severing ties of kinship. In a dream, it can sometimes symbolize marriage. And whoever sees blood in a dream from slaughtering a man, this indicates injustice and the viewer's departure from religion, and with his wife, if he sees the dead slaughtering for himself, it indicates many sins and disobedience. Seeing slaughter in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees a human being slaughtered in her dream, this means that she has committed a false act, and slaughtering a stranger for a married woman indicates her mistreatment of those around her. And slaughtering a married woman for her son is a sign of her injustice to him. And if she sees that she is slaughtering a woman she knows without blood, this indicates a charitable connection with her, and as for slaughtering a dead man by the father in a married woman's dream, this indicates her bad behavior and insulting her father. Because of her. If the wife sees that she is slaughtering her husband, the vision indicates divorce. And if a married woman sees that she slaughtered her husband, this indicates her separation, and seeing her husband slaughtered with a knife is evidence of a bad relationship with him, and if the married woman is pregnant, this indicates her difficulty. Childbirth and a dream about slaughtering a son for a pregnant woman indicates that the fetus will be harmed, and seeing a pregnant woman slaughtering symbolizes that she will suffer from a serious illness, God knows best. You may also be interested in: A detailed interpretation of a dream about a knife in a dream for married, pregnant and single women. Interpretation of a dream about killing someone with a knife. Seeing someone slaughtering with a knife means insulting others with insulting words. Seeing someone slaughtering with a knife and getting covered in blood symbolizes committing a mistake against someone he knows. Whoever sees in a dream that someone slaughtered him with a knife means hearing insulting words. Seeing someone slaughtering another person with a knife symbolizes the spread of strife. As for the dream of slaughtering a dead person with a knife, this indicates that he is being spoken about in bad terms among people, and the dream of slaughtering a person you know with a knife is evidence of his mistreatment. From the enemy, victory over him. Seeing slaughter in a dream for an unmarried woman. The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of someone who was slaughtered in the dream of an unmarried girl as mistreatment of others, and slaughtering unmarried people for her is a sign of shame for them. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream a man slaughtering another person, this indicates the emergence of disorder, and if she sees her father slaughtering her, the dream shows his shortcomings towards her. Interpretation of dreams of slaughtering without blood

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing travel in a dream for a single woman, seeing traveling in a dream for a single woman by car, and traveling by plane in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Young people generally have a great passion for travel, whether to complete their studies, work, or even just take a walk and explore new places, but seeing travel in a dream has many connotations for that day. We will shed light on the interpretations of seeing travel in a dream for a single woman. Seeing travel in a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of seeing travel in a dream for a single woman shows that she is an ambitious person and always seeks to move from one place to another to discover new things and increase her life experiences. God knows best. As for her dream that she relies on the plane to travel somewhere, this is an indication that she has many ambitions that she seeks to reach, so you find her working hard all the time to achieve that. The dream of getting engaged in the next few days. Traveling in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of her patience in many matters of her life, and it is better not to despair, because God’s help is near. The news is close to changing the dreamer’s life radically and for the better, God willing. Seeing travel in a dream of an unmarried woman according to Ibn Sirin. In the interpretation of the dream of traveling in a dream of an unmarried woman, the respected researcher showed that there is a righteous young man who is trying to propose to the priest, knowing that he will agree with him and they will live together in happiness. A single dream is a sign that she will move to a better state in her life and achieve many goals in her life. Also, traveling in a single woman’s dream is evidence of her desire to escape from the problems that surround her in her life due to their frequent presence, which makes her sleep almost safely, but there is no need. To despair because God's comfort is near no matter what. A lot of time passes and she is now on the right path that will lead her to her dreams. The specialized online dream interpretation site features a selection of the best dream and vision interpreters in the Arab world. To access it, type the dream interpretation website on the Internet on Google. The most important interpretations of seeing travel in a dream for a single woman. Seeing trips in a dream for a single woman by car. Traveling by car in an individual’s dream has many connotations, the most prominent of which are: It symbolizes progress in life and many achievements. Interpretation of the dreamer’s dream about a working woman is a guide. However, her professional position will rise in the coming days due to promotions. Ibn Shaheen believes that this dream explains that the dreamer’s life will be full of many adventures. Traveling by plane in a single woman’s dream. Traveling abroad by plane in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of the soonest date of her marriage in reality, in addition to She will live a happy life with her husband and he will have the best share in this life, God Almighty. The dream also symbolizes that she will face many obstacles and obstacles in her life, but God Almighty will bless her with enough strength to overcome them all and finally succeed in reaching her goal. If the dreamer is an employee, then traveling by plane in the dream is an indication that she will receive a new promotion in the near future, But if the dreamer is suffering from the burdens of life, then the dream promises her that her life is in the future. The days will get better
